I'm still alive.
Got a job (?) to fund my destructive habits.
Got invited to a party (I think it is up in flagstaff though...pft).
Doing good.
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/12983.html

As unfortunate as it is, it takes me getting pretty drunk to write this but... The 18th of July makes it four years.
I don't think the pain will ever fully fade, and maybe that's just how it is when you lose someone close to you, even if it's a love/hate relationship.
It's not something that you can easily come to terms with, even though the fact of the matter is that they're dead, forever, and nothing you can ever do will ever change that.
It's just how it is.
Perhaps it's because it's within the formative years, even if it's towards the end of them?
You can never impart how important this would be to someone else. It's not really something that many can understand unless they're in a similar situation and even then it's only sympathy, not understanding.
Every situation is different.

I just hope that maybe, now that his pain is (hopefully) over with forever, it is better than the pain he went through while in life.

And that I can somehow honor his memory and the effort towards nurturing me (however twisted the attempts may have been) and make something of myself.
Maybe he's now in peace.

I think it's probably a little early for a person to have their father die for someone in this kind of culture, but that's just something I gotta deal with, and nothing that I can probably ever ... I dunno.
I'm just gonna end this post now.
Nothing I can say, Nothing I can do.
This is just for catharsis, and I'm sure it won't serve as a lesson for anyone else.
But, if it were my place, I'd beg all people who are distant from their parents to please rectify the situation some way and make things good while they still can, because once they die you never get that chance ever again. It's a closed book, and a brutal reality.

Even if he sucked as my father, he was still as good a person as he could be, given the circumstances, and I've always loved him, no matter what.

R.I.P.

Most love to Sid's parents for when it first happened. They're still in my memories. Love forever to those who supported me during then.

Fucking linguistics and semiology.

3:00am - And now that I've read a bit up on rape shield law, "roe v. wade for men," etc, and I'm tired out of my mind, I'm going to try to fall asleep.

Gonna shave my head after checking myself in and out of mental health dealios.
No seriously, I might actually shave my head.
The whole receding hairline thing is lame, and I think my hair is fighting a losing battle. Or at least it is a good enough excuse to not have to deal with that crap anymore. Besides, I've always wondered what I'd look like.

Damn it feels good to be a gangsta.
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/11487.html

I can't help but have an overwhelming feeling of being a feckless wastrel.
Perhaps because I am.
I know I usually say "Oh, I'll accomplish something, I'm sure, just wait and see," except it is usually said with more conviction, to fool others if not myself as well.
But I really have achieved more lately.
I've quit smoking, I no longer binge-drink, and rarely drink at all.
I am getting paid for oddjobs here and there, and will get a steady job soon.
I pay rent and pay for my own food now, and the gas that I use in my car.
Not as stagnant as I used to be.

But I feel like it is not enough. The mistakes I've made in the past were too costly, and set me back so far. I feel like I should have my associates degree within 6 months from now, move to Virginia before winter, and get my own place there, as well as fully own my car.
The first part probably won't happen, the second may, the third would have to if the second did, and the fourth one may as well.

I agonized a bit over the moving issue with one of my friends.
I thought out loud "But if I move, it will set me back that much more from getting my degree."
And the question posed back to me was "Think about your priorities. Would you rather get by, and enjoy life with your friends, or maybe make money hand over fist, but have no joy in life?"
It caught me off guard. I think my values have slowly warped over the years. They've always been with friends first. Many times at my own expense. But to realize that I am confused over the friends vs money matter was startling.

Does it mean I am becoming more realistic and coming into adulthood now? Or does it mean that I am forsaking values that I have kept all my life because they are no longer convenient?
I don't know, and it is probably not that big of a deal. Over-analyzation as always.

I've also realized that I've had the better part of a year pass me by since my last love interest, and that I haven't wanted anyone since then.
Not truly.

Maybe it is all connected. Perhaps I am becoming more self-centered? My loss of interest in females as anything more than perhaps sex objects (irony) or friends and my further lack of dedication towards friends are signs of self-absorption.
But maybe none of my friends that I am speaking of were ever truly dedicated towards me.
Maybe the fact that I many times feel like I am a feckless wastrel is because I've always been a feckless wastrel, more or less, and that self-centeredness is not something new, but merely has increased.

I could sure go for a damn joint and some alcohol right about now.
A day late on that. Ha.
By the way, ignore this post.
Thanks.

I did my good deed today.
I cheered someone up that really needed it.
I think perhaps, as I've thought before, that is what I am to do.
As ironic as that may sound, the King of Melancholy and Captain of Apathy is to make others happy.
Maybe in this way I can feel a bit of the something that I give to them, although I have little of it to give in the first place.
Hrm.

She was very sad. I bought her some pumpkin, chocolate chip cookies.
That apparently made her day. Just some sweet, small gesture as that.
Making her day only cost me $3.99. It was well worth it.

On the other hand, my sister's car has been stolen. Which means my car, which is already trying to die, will be rode into the ground. Wee.
It's apparently fine, but we'll see. It was doing some crazy shit before.


The thought of her still haunts me.
It both haunts and taunts. I don't understand this.
I realized today that the thirteenth is soon coming up.
A friday the 13th to be exact.
My mouth dropped in shock when I connected that with months ago.
Days, years. Months. It doesn't matter how long ago. I will remember it.
Just as I do the others.

I reflected back on the things I have said to her. Some of them were downright harsh. Perhaps truthful. Perhaps not. The intention behind the words, the spirit of them, though, is caustic.
For two reasons:
The animosity towards her alone poisoned me.
And because some of the things that I said while thinking of her I could've been saying while standing in front of a mirror.

That seems to be the case most of the time.

I've once gone so far as to say I am everyone and no one.
Another facet of that insidious disorder.

However, I've said that I would never talk to her again.
I suppose I should stick by this.
If not for integrity, than for myself. And if not for myself, than for her.



These days seem somewhat lonely.
I find myself fascinated and captivated as things move to a slow pace. Almost a stand-still.
A still-frame of my surroundings.
Or perhaps that these things move so quickly and are so cyclic that blinking does nothing to obscure even for a moment what is going on, because it is all the same. I think it to be the other, though.
A crawl, to be sure.

It was apparently only nine days since I got a call.
I either didn't notice it, paid no attention to it, or time has certainly become molasses.

I always seem to have a surplus of Klonopin.
I can fix that.
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/7171.html

I just hope I can produce something that gives meaning and resonates with people so powerfully as something like music...
Or I dunno...do something meaningful.
Not become some used tool/cog in the "machine."
Another gear turning for a purpose not of it's own, mindless and always working for something distant and impersonal.
Another instance in the continuation of meaninglessness in a world of commercialism and immediate gratification in which truth is distorted/hidden, the masses sedated.
Doing a lot of nothing for some more nothing.

Where the fuck am I headed?

What the fuck does it all mean?
Who am I working for?
Is it really me?

"Money" is just green toilet paper that I keep in my fucking back pocket for convenience!
(Yeah, right)...

I just don't know anymore.

"North" is just a comforting idea.

What type of action can be taken that is meaningful is such a complicate, complex, uncertain universe?
Is it such because of my own need to complicate things?
Or is there really an absence of substance in this human world?
Why is my mind ever asking questions?
I just wish I could ...
I don't even fucking know.

I fucking hate this.
I am never going to be able to buckle down and just accept shit and mindlessly go towards a meaningless goal contently.
Ever.

I fucking hate it.

It seems the only times I'm ever happy are when I'm apathetic, drained, or sleeping.

Other than that, I'm always tense. Always uncertain. Always questioning. It's like something is constantly making my soul itch, and I can never scratch it.
There's a desire unachievable, a thirst unquenchable in me.

Wu-chi, I suppose...

http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/6746.html

Today was fucking great.
I was so happy, smiling the whole time, talking people up, and flirting with people and vice versa.
Had a good subway sandwhich, and a few smokes.
I just felt great about myself and everything pretty much the whole day.
I haven't been this happy in a long, long while.

Pretty much tongue-in-cheek the whole time, with a carefree attitude.

Tomorrow will be even better -
No work. Yes, motherfucker!

Although I have some beef that needs to be squashed tomorrow.
We'll see how that goes. It doesn't matter now though, I'll think about it when that comes.

I'm gonna talk to Shawn again tonight. Him and I are getting cool with eachother again. We kinda fell away from eachother for numerous reasons, but him and I are cool (with eachother as well as better off individually).
Although he might be going through a hard time soon. I'm gonna try and be a better friend than I have been, although I think I've done not a bad job insofar, but I know I could've done better. And he does deserve better than what I've been giving, so yeah...
Poor guy.
It's one of those friendships that has that resonance.
I spoke to someone else about that lately. "Resonance" in a relationship that you have with someone. Family, friends, significant other. Whatever. It's something that is rare for some, never felt for others, and for fortunate people like myself, something that can sometimes be easily cultivated.

*shrugs*

Gotta do more studying too.
But whatever.
Type at you fuckers later.
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/6292.html

Today was kinda uneventful.
Same shit, different day.
I dunno.

Chick that no one likes at work got demoted.

Doreen always joking that I'm stripping. And then with her weird noises that she makes, because of aqua teen hunger force. Weird, she's an adult...
She should stop hanging out with her kids and hang out with some adults...I dunno.

I felt like I was going to fall asleep at work today.
I get more tired as each day goes by. I can barely hang on.
I almost decided to say I was sick and leave for home early.
SO tired. I don't know why. I think I get an ok amount of sleep.
I'm starting to eat better (more often) now, so I don't know why I'm getting more tired. That makes no sense.
I guess I'll figure it out...

They have me working every day this week. Fuckers. Eight hours a day, or don't waste my time. Christ.
Plus they haven't promoted me yet like they said they would. If they don't start making good on that promise within a week or two, I'll start looking for a job. If I find one before they get me scheduled for training, I'm quitting. Simple as that. I'm not going to be someone they lie to. They can eat it, because if I leave, they'll realize how bad they really needed me, and piss their pants whenever it starts getting busy.
I'm not wasting my time on these shitheads. I got money to make, goals to accomplish, dreams to realize. These suckers can lick the shit off my dick if they think that they'll get in the way of these things and that I'll stand by and twiddle my fucking thumbs.

Chick at work keeps flirting with me. Pretty much the hottest one there. She's Christian, but I'm not looking for a relationship, so that shouldn't be a problem. She keeps telling me about how she's got a hangover when she comes into work. I recently started suggesting we drink and hang out together. She replied "Well, come on over."
Fuck, yes.
Even if I don't do shit with her, that would be a major ego boost to just dangle that girl around. But who knows what I'll do. I'll decide once the situation arises, if it does. It might not even be like I think it is, so yeah, we'll see.
I doubt I'd do something like that. Although I also don't know how likely it is for me to be a man-whore. She is pretty hot, but I've never really done anything like that, and always found it to be...not me - To fuck a chick over, especially when it comes to sex. But...hey, if we're drinking and having a good time, and she's been flirting with me, I doubt she's looking for a serious relationship, and knows exactly what to expect.

Again, we'll see.

I need to start taking my studying seriously. Because that's my ticket to wherever it is I wanna be. So that's what's going to happen.
Even if I'm tired as fuck.

Speaking of which, I gotta head off to sleep sometime soon. Tired.
Wrapping it up.
Later, fuckers.
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/5912.html

This early-in-the-morning shit is killing me. Work =/
But all I gotta do is stick it out, keep studying for the damn certifications, wait it out until I get cashier training, be the corporate bitch for a little while after saving up some green, then dip out and leave this place. Get a good recommendation at whatever job I might have after that.
It's not that bad.
Just wish I had a fast-forward button.

I can't exercise much anymore because I don't have the energy.
I like staying up a bit to have my own time to myself, but then I gotta get up early to go to work.
That's just something that's gotta be sacrificed for the long-term goal.
Whenever things change, that will be taken back up.

Apparently a certain someone called me while I set the phone down during a phonecall I was already on.
I didn't know it cuz I had it on mute, set down, and went off to do something else.
Boring person.

But, I'm sure the person that called planned to chew me out.
I had been told that this was her intent beforehand.
So much for grace. Not that she ever aimed for it anyways.
I wouldn't have picked up the phone anyways, but luckily any (stress) reaction that might've occurred as a response to this didn't.

She's out of my life.
Simple as that.

On other news, I trimmed the trees.
We now have this pretty slick tool where you just position the top portion of it slightly above the branch, and then pull a cord. Razor sharp mechanism swings close and *snip*. Branch is gone. Or the saw part of it. Used that too.

I was gonna go out to the movies tonight, but everyone was too damn broke.
Or I was left out because a particular person that I don't like (and she in turn doesn't like me) was going to go as well.
Doesn't matter.
One of the other guys that was going to go make me uncomfortable with his psychotically-overboard flameness. Not that I'm not secure in my own sexuality, but that his constant flirting with me in a serious manner is a little unnerving, especially since he's old enough to be my grandfather.

...Weird.

Also, some dude at work was going to catch a jumping by some other chodes.
One which I don't like, another which is a weirdo, and two other guys I don't know were going to jump him.
I told him, even though he filed the police report, if I saw them beating on him while I happened to be walking out into the parking lot that they would be in for a rude awakening in the form of elbows, fists, feet, and knees. Plus whatever I could get my hands on.

One-on-one is fine, but a jumping is fucking retarded, especially if it's a personal problem.
That's for pussies.
You might as well be hitting an eight year old girl, punk-bitches.
A possible 12 blows all at once? Against one person?
Fucking weak-ass pussies.
No balls.
They gotta do it together, like they were up against some goliath.

Michelle just called me, so I'm gonna wrap this up.
Type to you later, fools.
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/5527.html

Today was the best goddamned day of my life.
Do you want to know why?
Because I made it that way.

It's the best fucking day of my life, and I'm happy.
I did a jig in the parking lot.
I danced around on the carts, and whistled while I worked.
I fucking had a blast.

And I joked around with my friends, and enjoyed the breeze on my warm body, and the sun on my face, and the relief from the brightness of the sun, and the joy of sitting down after standing so long.

I smirked at somebody randomly whistling like a bird, and at the (today they were non-perverted) jokes my perverted manager made, and accepted it all.

And I'm happy.
Skip-to-my-fucking-loo, my darlin'.

Yayyyyy.

Yeah, nigga.
Party at my house.
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/5165.html

I'm sorry I'm that important to you.
Because I'm falling from grace now, and it's not going to be pretty.
It's a nose-dive, not a hang-glide.

So just secure your helmet and hope the parachute opens.

Oh...
You were holding on just to steal the parachute from me?

Ha.
Today was good.
Everday is good. Great, even.
Had fun.
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/5114.html

O Black Widow, Black Widow, do not tempt me again tonight.
I can already see your web in the pale moonlight.
And despite my fright I might start to climb right now.

You got me tangled up in your web spun so well.
Your web of betrayal, of lies, of death, of hell.
I'm caught in your web, held fast, and I don't know how.

It was a fun time, Black Widow.
But I learned my way out.
And you won't hold me again.
Never will your web ensnare me again, my friend.

Your venemous mouth was too much,
And your bite a thousand deaths.
And if it wasn't Love, I'm still trying to catch my breath.
So what was it?

You've moved onto another meal, my dear Black Widow.
Better them than me.
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/4772.html

Going to some place called "Arcosanti."
Hopefully it's beauty will work it's magic.
Maybe I'll be restored.
Doubt it.

God.
Sometimes the thoughts that go through my mind are so taunting.
About myself.
When I think about the reasons behind the things I do, or the way I am.
Or the reasons behind not doing things.
It's maddening.

I'm so very tired.
I slept ten hours. I'm still very tired.
I don't even know if I can go, I'm so tired.
I'll just pass out at the wheel or fall asleep on the way there.
My eyelids feel kinda heavy.

I'm stuck in that rat maze.
Waiting to run into a mousetrap.
Searching for that cheese.
Don't know what that cheese looks like. But I can smell it.
I know I want it, whatever it is.
I hunger for it.
I follow it's haunting trail, unable to reach it directly, and unable to work my way through the maze to it.

I want either that cheese, or the mousetrap.
I don't want to continue wandering. It's one or the other.
Life or death.
Eros or Thanatos.
Yes, or no.

I'm so tired of it. The meaningless toil. The only meaning is pleasure right now, because that's the only meaning I can grasp.
Interesting choice of words.
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/4305.html

You know what, motherfucker?
I don't appreciate you coming to my store with your fucking foot falling off, asking me to drive you to the hospital. Suck me.

You know what, motherfucker?
I don't appreciate you SHITTING IN YOUR PANTS, and then ripping them OFF YOUR ASS, and placing them in the stall. K? Suck me real well, you dirty fuck.

And Mel (A manager), you mario-mustached motherfucker. You know what?
You can suck my motherfucking dick until I'm dry and bleeding from friction burn, because guess what, asshole!? I don't want to do shit that's gonna take a half hour three minutes before my fucking lunch break! You can shove your "lolz, Im a manager at a GROCERY STORE" ego up your tall, fat, balding ass, because I don't give a shit if you can fire me from my (pretty much) MINIMUM WAGE job! KTHXBAI *Shotgun blast to your face*
PWNT. Postal workeresque rage ftw!

I'm done with relationships. Reiteration, nigga. Like it, or lick it.

So, I had a lady at my work a few days ago pretty much say "Hi, I'm checking out your ass, and I like it."
I was dusting something, kinda bent over. "I love to see a guy doing that."

Oh yes...
Nigga got it.
Unless she was talking about the fact that I was cleaning.
...Bitch.

Yeah...
This song's good. Besides the religious shit.

Arizona is too conservative...
I dunno. I got other shit to say, but I can't remember.
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/3996.html

Yeah.
I'm gonna be signing on AIM more often.

I feel like shit lately, but then again don't.
Kinda like it doesn't matter how I feel.
I'm just trudging through it anyways, whether it's a fucking smooth path lined with rose bushes or a swamp full of shit and leeches.
Not much choice otherwise.

I really miss my friends from Virginia.
I really miss the life I had there.
I wish that I had some warmth in my life, other than from an alcohol bottle.
I'm not happy unless I'm drunk, or if I am, it's a very small amount of time.
What kind of life is that?

The kind that continues no matter.

I'm abstaining from relationships.
...Yeah. Dunno.

So much other shit from other things in my life that I would want to write down in here, but little of it has relevance to the people who would read this and I'm very withdrawn lately anyways.
I'm surprised I even wrote this. The only thing that prompted me to do so was Alden's request for more posts. *shoutout*
http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/3778.html

http://dream-crusher86.livejournal.com/3336.html

Last night sucked.
And I dreamed that I was drunk. That was weird.

People at work suck. Most of them anyways.

Tomorrow, I realized, I have all day off from everything...
except homework and studying. Study day, I guess.

I got paid yesterday.

I'm not going to bother with relationships. I've decided this.
The only person I'm ever going out with is Captain Morgan, etc.
An alcohol bottle is infinitely more reliable than a female.

You know what to expect. There is never any surprises.
You get exactly what you want out of it.
It will never violate your trust, or hurt your feelings.
And it makes you feel good.

Mmm...
Yeah. I found my lifemate.

Speaking of which, exercising while smashed is...awkward.


I just realized the majority of my journal entry was about alcohol, so I gotta add some more.

My telephone number book thingy is falling apart. Pages are coming out, numbers are old/no longer good, scratched out, or from people who I don't want to talk to anymore.

And my little scribblin' notebooks that should be full of out-pourings aren't.

There were several disgruntled customers today.
One of them was a fucking ex-convict that was pretty much threatening to throw down with me if one more tiny thing was wrong.
I walked away, calmly, and went in the back and chilled until I was ready to come back to the front.
I swear to fucking fuck that I wanted to break his face and lay him out in front of everyone. Fuck his tough man shit, he can try that shit on someone else. Jackass.

On a related topic, I'm thinking about buying a gun. Perhaps a .22 to start out. Who knows?

On the flip-side of that, I'm thinking about getting back into Chin-Na, which was part of my first training in Tai Chi, as it was taught to me. Pleh.

An addition to the songs on my music, I'm also now listening to HED p.e - Feel good.

I think I realized alot of the times the things that I do for people is really just for myself.
Because I care about whether or not I'm a "bad" person. I realized this when I noticed that I only help people when I feel like it. "Well, everyone's like that. If you don't feel like it, you don't do it."
No. I don't even care about their shit when I don't feel like it. I just brush them off.

So, today I came up with what I believe to be my own (incomplete) philosophy while being cooked under the sun in the parking lot pushing about 80lbs of metal...

It had something to do with purpose, and simplicity and complexity to explain the nature of things and how it was not necessarily dualistic in nature, because of the varying degrees of simplicity and complexity.
And with each individual/thing, the more complex or simple it was determined how well it functioned towards it's one purpose. Not that the person or thing could only have one purpose, but that it exists for one main purpose.

The more simplistic it was, or more specifically, the more consistent/coherent or same it was in it's operative and static nature, the better it would function in it's main purpose. The more complex, the more difficult it would be for it to do so (generalization).

Of course, I've forgotten much of it...
I didn't have pen and paper on handy, and was at work.

I'm sure it would make no sense in many scenarios, and thus be tossed in the trash, but I can sorta see where I was coming from with it....


Sometimes I just wanna kill.

The passing of each day is like the pounding of a drum.
I'm trying to march to the beat of that drum.
Each beat, each footfall, in synchronization.
Or at least that's the goal.

But the drumming is becoming deafening, and my feet won't move quick enough. My body is starting to slowly tire from it.

Shoot that fucking drummer boy...


The passing of each day is like the pathetic pounding on the wall of a prison. Each time, it hurts more. Each time, the anger builds. Each time, the reality of the situation sets in more, causing the senses to dull as insanity takes over and all focus is on the blurry, dizzying thoughts that make too little sense, until I finally settle into the erratic patterns comfortably.
Then the physical prison no longer matters. The broken, bleeding fist no longer matters. The pain, the reality doesn't matter.
Just the mental prison I've put myself in.
And by then, that doesn't matter.
Just the warmth.
The alcohol, the pills, the sleep, the unreal, whatever escape artist trickery to pull the wool over my own eyes.

The only reason I have been getting up to go to work is to work until I'm done and then be so tired to fall asleep just so I can get up to go to work to be tired all over again...Tired of life, getting away from life...Making work my life...

I now understand how our society can have such an emphasis on work.
The Void. Lacking. Discontent. So decadent, yet none of it will satisfy.
Even people let you down eventually...
...There's always work to be done.
...There's always more alcohol to drown you into blessed oblivion, dreamless sleep.
There's always one more fucking way to escape it.
There's always another way to be emotionally, spiritually bankrupt.
There's always another way to be numb to...what? Nothing. Numb to the lack of something, or rather the effects of the inexistence of something substantial.

We have no substantial ground, no base, no basis. So as we go into freefall, we grasp onto whatever we can to temporarily slow our descent, but it will eventually give way, or we will.

There's always an alternative.

In a relationship, as soon as someone stops getting what they need, things go haywire.
They either cheat, look for someone else, or freak out, or break up with the person.
Instead of working with reality, and working the situation out
Easier to escape. Just like everyone does with all other aspects of reality.

Escapism, decadence, and wrongful selfishness as well as immediate gratification...these are immense problems with our society

I don't know what it is exactly. I hear the word "Love" alot, but I don't know if that's what I'm sensing.
I think Love is kinda like a lost concept.
A long-lost civilization, or a dead language.
Part of pop culture, mentioned alot, even used frequently as an idea, but never spoken, never lived, never seen or practiced.
Falling in love with the idea of love, because it's foreign and romanticized.
The truth of love as a reality is just like other parts of life. A struggle.

And that's why people never attain it. Because they don't really want to. Love is just as sickening as everything else that disappoints them.

Realizing what love is can be likened to this scenario:

You wake up in the morning. Soft rays of light enter through your window, gently causing you to wake from your restful slumber. You trudge your way towards the refrigerator, looking for that perfect breakfast. Instead, the only thing that jumps out at you is milk. So you prepare yourself some cereal. Except there is no lucky charms. Just wheat chex. So you pour in the milk anyways, and lift your spoon up to take a bite, and the taste of sour milk explodes in your mouth, and you spit it out, disgusted and disappointed. You blame someone else for the spoiled milk and silently mutter to yourself as you pour it out.

This is how many people first experience love, but because it does not match what is in their head, they toss it away. They don't realize that you've got to get your fucking lazy ass up, and actually look for some fucking eggs, jelly, bread, butter, a frying pan, and a flipper, and actually fucking cook. Actually spread the god damned jelly on the buttered bread, and put it on a plate. And just maybe your milk won't be sour that time, along with the breakfast you actually put effort into. Idiot.

A lot of people, if they read this, would nod their head, totally unaware of themself, thinking "I know someone just like that."
Yeah. Themself.
I could continue on this rant, but it would go on forever, and I'll just ruin my day with venomous anger over how fucked up the many facets of our society are.
